Package restaurant

package restaurant
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    MenuItem
    The MenuItem interface defines a set of methods to accesss the menu related classes i.e.MenuBundle and MenuLeaf.
    MenuList
    The MenuList interface defines a set of methods to accesss the classes which contain multiple menu items.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    AbstractMenuItem
    The base class for all menu related classes MenuBundle, MenuLeaf).
    Category
    The category class is used in restaurant menu.
    InputHandler
    The input wrapper class for input exceptions.
    MenuBundle
    The MenuBundle class is a subclass of AbstractMenuItem class which represents a promotional items sold in set.
    MenuLeaf
    The MenuLeaf class is a subclass of AbstractMenuItem class which represents individual alacarte item.
    Order
    The Order class is a record of a collection of menu items made by customers.
    Reservation
    Reservation for a specific table and time.
    Restaurant
    Restaurant class bundles different systems in the restaurant.
    RestaurantApp
    Main application entry point
    SalesReport
    Sales report for a given time period.
    Staff
    Restaurant staff information.
    TableManager
    Manages table and reservation in the restaurant.
